bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of tumors generated by lice or parasitic microorganisms resembling lice, with localized itching. When the tumors open lice appear. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ren shi 人 虱 quotes Ji shen lu 稽神錄 : 浮梁李生背起如盂，惟癢不可忍，人皆不識。醫士秦德立 云：此虱瘤也。以藥傅之，一夕瘤破，出虱斗余 , “Mr. Li from Fuliang had a growth like a jar on his back. The itching was unbearable. Nobody knew what this was. Qin Deli, a physician, said: This is a lice tumor . He applied a medication to it. After one night had passed the tumor broke open and more than a bushel of lice left it”.
